mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pinglun (details, shequid, userid, like_count) VALUES (#{details}, #{shequid}, #{userid}, #{likeCount});
mapper.update: UPDATE pinglun SET like_count = like_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, u.name, u.avatar FROM pinglun p JOIN user u ON p.userid = u.id WHERE p.shequid = #{shequId}
